amendment.description: An amendment numbered 36 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to convey three parcels of land, known as the Earle May Recreational Area, from the Army Corps of Engineers to the City of Bainbridge.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (GA) amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Bishop (GA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (GA) amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
